successes.title: XERISCOPE: The Orbiting Mechanical Automatic Watch by XERIC
successes.description: Meet the XERISCOPE: Stop strangers in their tracks with an novel mechanical time machine beating on your wrist.

Pledges.description: SILVER & BLACK EARLY BIRD.  Save $150 off the expected retail price.  Just $349 for the first 25 backers of the limited edition XERISCOPE XS3014 watches in stainless steel & black.
SILVER & WHITE EARLY BIRD.  Save $150 off the expected retail price. Just $349 for the first 25 backers of the limited edition XERISCOPE XS3016 watches in stainless steel & white.
GOLD & SILVER EARLY BIRD.  Save $200 off the expected retail price. Just $349 for the first 25 backers of the limited edition XERISCOPE XS3017 watches in stainless steel & gold.
ROSE GOLD & BLACK EARLY BIRD.  Save $200 off the expected retail price. Just $349 for the first 25 backers of the limited edition XERISCOPE XS3018 watches in rose gold ss & black.
ALL BLACK STEEL EARLY BIRD.  Save $200 off the expected retail price. Just $349 for the first 25 backers of the limited edition XERISCOPE XS3019 watches in black stainless steel.
SILVER & BLACK BACKER DEAL.  Save $100 off the expected retail price. Just $399 for one of the final 74 limited edition XERISCOPE XS3014 watches in stainless steel & black.
SILVER & WHITE BACKER DEAL.  Save $100 off the expected retail price. Just $399 for one of the final 74 limited edition XERISCOPE XS3016 watches in stainless steel & white.
GOLD & SILVER BACKER DEAL.  Save $150 off the expected retail price. Just $399 for one of the final 74 limited edition XERISCOPE XS3017 watches in stainless steel & gold.
ROSE GOLD & BLACK BACKER DEAL.  Save $150 off the expected retail price. Just $399 for one of the final 74 limited edition XERISCOPE XS3018 watches in rose gold & black.
ALL BLACK STEEL BACKER DEAL.  Save $150 off the expected retail price. Just $399 for one of the final 74 limited edition XERISCOPE XS3018 watches in black stainless steel.

NEW REWARD! SILVER BLACK OPEN SERIES Your watch will come with a Stainless Steel Mesh Strap & Black Leather Strap and Sapphire Crystal. Save $150 off the expected retail price. Just $399 for the non-limited XERISCOPE XS3020

NEW REWARD! ROSE GOLD OPEN SERIES Your watch will come with a Rose Gold Mesh Strap & Black Leather Strap and Sapphire Crystal. Save $200 off the expected retail price. Just $399 for the non-limited XERISCOPE XS3021

NEW REWARD! ALL BLACK OPEN SERIES Your watch will come with a Black Steel Mesh Strap & Black Leather Strap and Sapphire Crystal. Save $200 off the expected retail price. Just $399 for the non-limited XERISCOPE XS3022

NEW REWARD! SILVER WHITE OPEN SERIES Your watch will come with a Stainless Steel Mesh Strap & Black Leather Strap and Sapphire Crystal. Save $150 off the expected retail price. Just $399 for the non-limited XERISCOPE XS3023

NEW REWARD! GOLD BLACK OPEN SERIES Your watch will come with a Gold Mesh Strap & Black Leather Strap and Sapphire Crystal. Save $200 off the expected retail price. Just $399 for the non-limited XERISCOPE XS3024

BLACK & TAN LIMITED EDITION STRETCH GOAL - The first 49 watches of the limited edition 100 XERISCOPE XS3015 in black stainless steel and tan leather strap with bonus black leather strap.  (The second group of 49 limited edition Black & Tan watches will be released at 9 a.m. PST on December 2nd.)
BLACK & TAN LIMITED EDITION STRETCH GOAL - The last 49 watches of the limited edition 100 XERISCOPE XS3015 in black stainless steel and tan leather strap with bonus black leather strap.

NEW REWARD! BLACK & TAN OPEN SERIES Your watch will come with both tan & black leather straps, Halo hand and sapphire crystal. Save $200 off the expected retail price. Just $399 for the non-limited XERISCOPE XS3025
